meanings.sent1: The man with the paunchiest belly struggled to bend over.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the paunchiest person in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The paunchiest cat in the house always stole food from the others.
meanings.sent4: His paunchiest appearance made him look like he had swallowed a watermelon.
meanings.sent5: The paunchiest guy at the party stood out like a giant balloon.

meanings.sent1: Among the group, he was considered the paunchiest.
meanings.sent2: The paunchiest in the room had trouble fitting through the door.
meanings.sent3: The paunchiest of the team always led the way in eating contests.
meanings.sent4: In the animal kingdom, the walrus is known as one of the paunchiest creatures.
meanings.sent5: The paunchiest of all the pumpkins at the farm festival won first prize.
